name: Medical Reserve Corps Small Grant Program
objective: To support the development of Medical Reserve Corps (MRC) units in communities throughout the United States to: (1) increase capacity at the community level to respond during emergencies which have medical consequences, and (2) improve public health in communities through volunteerism on an ongoing basis.
top_agency_name: Department of Health and Human Services
applicant_types: U.S. Territories and possessions (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)

authorizations.text: Sections of t311(c) (1), 2811 and 2813 of the Public Health Service (PHS) Act.
